title: Hour 1 - Brian Windhorst Talks Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook's Future
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Brian Windhorst Talks Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook's Future
description:
Dan reacts to the news of Arte Moreno planning to sell the Los Angeles Angels. ESPN NBA Reporter Brian Windhorst joins Dan to explain why Kevin Durant chose to remain in Brooklyn. Plus, there is leftover etiquette drama in the studio!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
